lineage.Process: Merge tx_all;tza_lines;ago_lines;cod_lines;BWA_lines E:\AICD\Analysis\Power\PowerSectorReview\Access_model\tx_all2.shp "TYPE_INFR TYPE_INFR true false false 50 Text 0 0 ,First,#,tx_all,TYPE_INFR,-1,-1,tza_lines,TYPE_INFR,-1,-1,ago_lines,TYPE_INFR,-1,-1,cod_lines,TYPE_INFR,-1,-1,BWA_lines,TYPE_INFR,-1,-1;STATUS STATUS true false false 50 Text 0 0 ,First,#,tx_all,STATUS,-1,-1,tza_lines,STATUS,-1,-1,ago_lines,STATUS,-1,-1,cod_lines,STATUS,-1,-1,BWA_lines,STATUS,-1,-1;BANDWIDTH BANDWIDTH true false false 10 Double 0 10 ,First,#,tx_all,BANDWIDTH,-1,-1,tza_lines,BANDWIDTH,-1,-1,ago_lines,BANDWIDTH,-1,-1,cod_lines,BANDWIDTH,-1,-1,BWA_lines,BANDWIDTH,-1,-1;FROM_ FROM_ true false false 15 Text 0 0 ,First,#,tx_all,FROM_,-1,-1,tza_lines,FROM_,-1,-1,ago_lines,FROM_,-1,-1,cod_lines,FROM_,-1,-1,BWA_lines,FROM_,-1,-1;Source Source true false false 254 Text 0 0 ,First,#,tx_all,Source,-1,-1,tza_lines,SOURCE,-1,-1,ago_lines,SOURCE,-1,-1,cod_lines,SOURCE,-1,-1,BWA_lines,SOURCE,-1,-1;OPR OPR true false false 4 Short 0 4 ,First,#,tx_all,OPR,-1,-1;TO_ TO_ true false false 50 Text 0 0 ,First,#,tza_lines,TO_,-1,-1,ago_lines,TO_,-1,-1,cod_lines,TO_,-1,-1,BWA_lines,TO_,-1,-1,tx_all,TO,-1,-1"

Merge tx_all2;new_lns E:\AICD\Global_GIS_Data\Utilities\Utilities\tx_all3.shp "TYPE_INFR TYPE_INFR true false false 50 Text 0 0 ,First,#,tx_all2,TYPE_INFR,-1,-1,new_lns,TYPE_INFR,-1,-1;STATUS STATUS true false false 50 Text 0 0 ,First,#,tx_all2,STATUS,-1,-1,new_lns,STATUS,-1,-1;BANDWIDTH BANDWIDTH true false false 10 Double 0 10 ,First,#,tx_all2,BANDWIDTH,-1,-1,new_lns,BANDWIDTH,-1,-1;FROM_ FROM_ true false false 15 Text 0 0 ,First,#,tx_all2,FROM_,-1,-1,new_lns,FROM_,-1,-1;Source Source true false false 254 Text 0 0 ,First,#,tx_all2,Source,-1,-1,new_lns,Source,-1,-1;OPR OPR true false false 4 Short 0 4 ,First,#,tx_all2,OPR,-1,-1;TO_ TO_ true false false 50 Text 0 0 ,First,#,tx_all2,TO_,-1,-1,new_lns,TO_2,-1,-1"

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3000

descript.abstract: REQUIRED: A brief narrative summary of the data set.
descript.purpose: REQUIRED: A summary of the intentions with which the data set was developed.

citeinfo.origin: REQUIRED: The name of an organization or individual that developed the data set.
citeinfo.pubdate: REQUIRED: The date when the data set is published or otherwise made available for release.
citeinfo.title: ETH_Txlines

timeperd.current: REQUIRED: The basis on which the time period of content information is determined.

sngdate.caldate: REQUIRED: The year (and optionally month, or month and day) for which the data set corresponds to the ground.

status.progress: REQUIRED: The state of the data set.
status.update: REQUIRED: The frequency with which changes and additions are made to the data set after the initial data set is completed.

theme.themekt: REQUIRED: Reference to a formally registered thesaurus or a similar authoritative source of theme keywords.
theme.themekey: REQUIRED: Common-use word or phrase used to describe the subject of the data set.

idinfo.accconst: REQUIRED: Restrictions and legal prerequisites for accessing the data set.
idinfo.useconst: REQUIRED: Restrictions and legal prerequisites for using the data set after access is granted.

dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3000
dataIdInfo.idAbs:
Data for medium and high voltage transmission lines were compiled for the AICD study led by the World Bank. A variety of sources were consulted, including regional power pool documents and maps from World Bank project documents. Locations are approximate, intended to reflect main connections, and are not representative of actual "path on the ground".
The following attributes were collected:
VOLTAGE_KV: Transmission line capacity in kilovolts, FROM_NM: Name of the locality where the link starts, TO_NM: Name of the locality where the link ends, STATUS: Status of link (Existing, Planned, Proposed, Under Study), SOURCES: Source of location or attribute information, PROJECT_NM: Name of project (planned links)

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata

cntorgp.cntper: REQUIRED: The person responsible for the metadata information.
cntorgp.cntorg: REQUIRED: The organization responsible for the metadata information.

cntaddr.addrtype: REQUIRED: The mailing and/or physical address for the organization or individual.
cntaddr.city: REQUIRED: The city of the address.
cntaddr.state: REQUIRED: The state or province of the address.
cntaddr.postal: REQUIRED: The ZIP or other postal code of the address.

cntinfo.cntvoice: REQUIRED: The telephone number by which individuals can speak to the organization or individual.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

dataLineage.statement: Transmission line features were digitized from hardcopy or generated from start and end nodes. Attributes were assigned using mutliple source documents.
